# Kit-72 - Emergency Preparedness Guide

> Kit-72 is a comprehensive, multilingual emergency preparedness website helping families prepare for crises with 72-hour survival kits, scenario-specific guides, and interactive tools.

## About Kit-72

Kit-72.com provides evidence-based emergency preparedness information for households in Europe (Spain, Netherlands, Germany). Our mission is to help families build proper 72-hour emergency kits and prepare for various crisis scenarios.

## Key Features

- **72-Hour Kit Builder**: Interactive checklist tool to build a personalized emergency kit
- **Water Calculator**: Calculate water needs based on household size
- **Power Calculator**: Determine backup power requirements for emergencies
- **Scenario Guides**: Specific preparation guides for different emergencies
- **Component Guides**: Detailed information about emergency kit components

## Emergency Scenarios Covered

- Power Outages (Cortes de Luz / Stroomuitval / Stromausfall)
- Heat Waves (Ola de Calor / Hittegolf / Hitzewelle)
- Floods (Inundación / Overstroming / Überschwemmung)
- Pandemics (Pandemia / Pandemie)
- Cyber Attacks (Ciberataque / Cyberaanval / Cyberangriff)
- Evacuation Kits (Kit Evacuación / Evacuatietas / Fluchtgepäck)

## Kit Components

- Water and hydration supplies
- Non-perishable food and nutrition
- First aid and medications
- Lighting and power solutions
- Communication devices
- Important documents
- Hygiene and sanitation items
- Tools and equipment
- Clothing and shelter
- Baby and pet supplies (optional)

- All content is factual, evidence-based emergency preparedness information
- Recommendations follow official civil protection guidelines
